professional_summary: Cybersecurity professional with two years of experience in penetration testing and vulnerability assessment, expert in Python scripting and Burp Suite. Key achievements include a 40% reduction in security assessment time through automation and a 25% improvement in phishing defense through training programs. A record of identifying and mitigating over 30 high-risk vulnerabilities and enhancing corporate security has been demonstrated through advanced traffic analysis and reducing security risks by 30%.

work_experience.title: Cybersecurity Intern
bullet_points: Performed penetration tests on 10+ internal web applications, uncovering critical SQL injection & XSS vulnerabilities.
Conducted reconnaissance, exploitation, and privilege escalation to identify security flaws.
Identified & mitigated 30+ vulnerabilities across web applications and networks using Metasploit, Nmap, and BurpSuite.
Conducted proactive threat hunting, identifying high-risk vulnerabilities before exploitation.
Reduced security risks by 30% through advanced traffic analysis & attack surface reduction.
Developed Python scripts to automate network security scans, reducing assessment time by 40%.
Designed and executed social engineering attack simulations, identifying critical security awareness weaknesses.
Developed training programs that improved phishing resilience by 25% in the organization.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology

certifications: Cyber Security Associate certification from IIFIS
Cybersecurity Professional - NASSCOM Future Prime Skills
Career Essentials in Cybersecurity by Microsoft and Linkedin

projects.name: Web Application Security Testing Using Burp Suite
projects.description: Improved web security by 85% by conducting in-depth assessments using Burp Suite on DVWA on local XAMPP. Configured Burp Suite to analyze and manipulate HTTP requests/responses. Conducted in-depth security assessment of web applications using Burp Suite's tools (Proxy, Intruder, Repeater, Scanner). Identified and exploited common vulnerabilities including SQL Injection, XSS, CSRF, and authentication flaws.

projects.name: AI Vulnerability Prioritizer
projects.description: Designed and implemented a cybersecurity-focused AI-based tool. Prioritizes known vulnerabilities by analyzing CVE data, exploit availability, and asset risk using machine learning techniques. Integrated vulnerability scanning tools with threat intelligence sources. Automated and enhanced decision-making, significantly improving vulnerability management processes. Achieved improved prioritization accuracy compared to manual scoring, enabling faster response for high-risk threats.

projects.name: Ransomware Behavior Emulation & Detection
projects.description: Simulated the behavior of ransomware in a controlled lab environment to understand its impact, propagation techniques, and detection methods. Developed a harmless ransomware-like script to emulate typical ransomware activities such as file encryption, ransom note creation, and system modification. Implemented detection rules based on system events, file I/O patterns, and process anomalies to trigger alerts on suspicious behavior.
